featured.text: A lover of tea since her childhood in Portugal, she brought tea-drinking to the English royal court and set a trend for the beverage in the seventeenth century.
That is why mothers who want to keep abreast of trends usually 18 the experts－their daughters.
The beginning of a new trend.

Even though 65% of teens claim that they rely on themselves for their fashion ideas, it is estimated that less than 20% of the teen population is innovative enough to drive fashion trends, according to a recent study by a marketing firm.
There isn’t a brand or a trend that these young people are not aware of.

definition.en_def: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.
definition.example: The trend in fashion this year is towards more sustainable materials.
